name: Hermosa
desc: A photographer who claims to be an adventurer instead. Many of her photos have either been published in newspapers or used as illustrations in books, with each one featuring her beloved cat.

customize.text: Adventure Challenge: Everything's in the Effect

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As a self-proclaimed "adventurer" and newspaper celebrity, Ms. Hermosa knows a thing or two about drawing the spotlight onto herself, and the same goes when she's dueling at the card table. When building her favorite decks, her goal is clear: to "create the most impressive visual effects"!
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: After a pneuma-ousia annihilation reaction occurs on an opponent's character, you gain 2 Omni Dice.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: King's Squire
customize.desc:
Teachings of the Forest: King's Squire

A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow.

"Remember, this whole world is but a dream of the forest... Please pass on the forest's language and the responsibility of protecting the King's land to future successors."

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Sword

This blade was just a prop before its blade was sharpened by the passage of time.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
